name: Girafarig
flavorText:
Its tail has a
small brain of its
own. Beware! If you get close, it
may react to your
scent and bite.

previous.name: Wobbuffet
previous.flavorText:
It hates light and
shock. If attack­
ed, it inflates its body to pump
up its counter­
strike.

next.name: Pineco
next.flavorText:
It likes to make
its shell thicker
by adding layers of tree bark. The
additional weight
doesn't bother it.

pokemon.name: Girafarig
pokemon.flavorText:
Its tail has a
small brain of its
own. Beware! If you get close, it
may react to your
scent and bite.

pokemon.name: Farigiraf
pokemon.flavorText: Now that the brain waves from the head and tail are synced up, the psychic power of this Pokémon is 10 times stronger than Girafarig’s.
